subject: Standing Committee for vetting of specifications pertaining to Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS) - reg.
text: HRy 77cq <THTf giferasrur (Tgq rRaev 8 TTHTf FA4, %Rat TGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) {7n 4adt vil-5 Q 6, Far7-10, Erd5, 7ff farit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Committee/2022 Policy Circular No_ 1.7.1.17/2022 dated 1st July , 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. PIU/DWE/ATMS-Part(1) (Computer No: 54928)} Sub:: Standing Committee for vetting of specifications pertaining to Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS) reg: To keep the Intelligent   Transportation Systems/ Advanced Traffic   Management Systems specifications in line with latest developments, a Standing Committee of following experts is formed to vet the ITS/ATMS specifications: i. Dr. Harikishan K. Reddy, CEO, Cube Highways, Industry Expert ji. Dr V Rangarajan; Technical Advisor, Industry Expert iii. Shri Udeep K Singhal, Regional Officer-Delhi; NHAI iv Shri Harsh Nisar, Joint Advisor (IT) , NHAI 2 The terms of the Committee would be as follows: Barring any unforeseen reasons, the committee will vet the Specifications within 15 days of reference made by NHAI: ii. For quick efficient deliberation and recommendation, the Committee Members may interact through Video Conferencing or other technologies. In case, a physical interaction of Committee Members is felt necessary, the same may be held at NHAI HQ Delhi. The lodging: boarding and transportation changes of Industry Experts of the Committee would be borne by NHAI as per entitlement of Chief General Manager in NHAI. iii. The committee, at its discretion, may also invite other experts/ stake holders in some meetings for getting their experts' advicer views on the subject: invitation to external experts/stake holders would require the approval of NHAI. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 07/22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
